Html: Previous versions of Prism have publiched the Guidance document in PDF format, as well as CHM. Unfortunately, I can't find a PDF file for the October 2009 version of the Guidance document. Has the Guidance document for that release been published in PDF format? Thanks

Hi

There isn’t any PDF format version of the Prism documentation released for the October 2009 version.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

I miss the PDF version too. A Word version would even be better. Something that can be print easily, or that I can put on my Sony Reader so I can read in the train on my way to/from work.

Hopefully this is something that can be done easily.

gabriel

I too would love to see a PDF version of the documentation. It's nice to print this kind of stuff for better reading.

Indeed this should be available for the final release of Prism, that is the version for Silverlight 4.
